title: Data Viz
text: Visuals created from TidyTuesday data are on this page. Feel free to look around :)

title: Veronica De Leon
text: Hi! I’m Veronica (she/her) and welcome to my website. I love math and am currently getting into data science. More about me and my site on the ‘About’ page.

title: Chocolate Rating
text:
The link to the original data is here


Show the code
library(ggplot2)
library("tidytuesdayR")
library(dplyr)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2022-01-18')




Show the code
chocolates <- tuesdata$chocolate |>
  select(cocoa_percent, rating) |>
  group_by(cocoa_percent) |>
  summarize(avg_rating = mean(rating), na.rm = TRUE) |>
  
  filter(cocoa_percent >= "75%")




Show the code
chocolates |>
  ggplot(aes(cocoa_percent, avg_rating)) +
  geom_point(color = "brown", alpha = 0.5, size = 3) +
  labs(
    x = "Cocoa Percent",
    y = "Average Chocolate Rating", 
    title = "Chocolate Rating by Cocoa Percent"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

title: Carbon Majors Emissions
text:
The link to the original data is here


Show the code
library(ggplot2)
library("tidytuesdayR")
library(dplyr)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2024-05-21')




Show the code
emit_co2 <- tuesdata$emissions
ggplot(emit_co2, aes(x = year, y = total_emissions_MtCO2e, color = commodity)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2) +
  facet_wrap(~ commodity) +
  labs(
    x = "Year",
    y = "Total CO2 Emissions",
    title = "Total Emissions per Commodity per Year",
    color = "Commodity"
  ) +
  theme_minimal ()

title: Veronica De Leon
text:
About Author
I was born in the Philippines but I’ve been living in Los Angeles since I was nine (the building pictured is in Downtown LA). I’m currently studying at Pomona College for mathematics and statistics. I love crafting, specifically knitting and sewing (the image on my home page is a design that I sewed onto a shirt).


About this site
This site currently contains projects for my Foundations of Data Science DS002 class.
